metadata.dc:author: González Naranjo, F
Capdevila Hernández, J
Escaf Barmadah, S
González Tuero, J S
Velasco Alonso, J
Méndez López, M
metadata.dc:description: We present a case of Vesical Amyloidosis (V.A.) in a woman with Rheumatoid Arthritis. Clinical data, other locations and Histochemical findings are consistent with Secondary Amyloidosis. After T.U.R., she was treated with Dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) and Colchicine. Her severe hematuria disappeared.
metadata.dc:title: Amiloidosis vesical.
[Bladder amyloidosis].
